result.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
result.translation: 3. Woo mari usun keenik qellittam wohuk ceelallo (jannataay, giraay, malaykaay, ....) Nummaysaah Salat elle faxxiima innal Abaah Soolisa mara, maaluk Yalli keenih yeceemik tu-Sadaqhat kee Yalli kicnih yan gital yacee mara kinni.
